ComicInfo.Summary: Sara Pezzini's daughter Hope has been abducted! Joining the Witchblade bearer in the search is the Darkness and the Angelus, and someone who only just escaped from Hell...
ComicInfo.Title: "Artifacts" part 2 of 13; "Origin: The Darkness"
ComicInfo.Characters: Tom Judge,Aphrodite IV,Witchblade,The Angelus,Jackie Estacado,Hope Pezzini,Sara Pezzini,Dr. Inder Chandrakhar,Detective Gleason,Danielle Baptiste
ComicInfo.Inker: Dale Keown,Dulce Brassea,Joe Weems,Rick Basaldua,Sal Regla
